name: pnp-list-formatting-generic-ryg-status-format
title: Project Indicator - RYG Status Format
shortDescription: Text or choice column where the value is used to determine the color. This allows for an easy visualization of status. To use a lookup column instead, replace all occurences of [$internalfieldname] with  [$internalfieldname.lookupValue].
longDescription: Text or choice column where the value is used to determine the color. This allows for an easy visualization of status. To use a lookup column instead, replace all occurences of [$internalfieldname] with  [$internalfieldname.lookupValue].

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
